parent.body: I started playing when the game was in version 1.8. So far the only update I liked was the ocean update, in a way diving into underwater caves was something new to do. Nether update is alright, but maybe it's hard for me to have an opinion since I never spend any time in the nether, go in, get warts and rods, then go out and usually never have a reason to go back in unless I want to make highways. Rest of the updates only feel like fillers, they're nothing new or exciting, just more stuff to fill the game with to make it feel like there's a lot to do.

post.body:
Under the aegis of conserving our liberties, so that we can live voluntarily conservative lives against the grain in an increasingly liberal society, the GOP traded away America in order to get along with its colleagues, directly and indirectly transferring control of our society to China.

Since the 1960s, the GOP have become essentially a party of pro-defense "Christian libertarians" following the example of William F. Buckley, who wanted to preserve liberty so that we could live conservative lives despite civilization heading pell-mell into the abyss of tyranny and collapse that Leftism always brings.

We can no longer do this. We need a conservative alternative, and we should call it The Conservative Party to acknowledge its roots and differentiate it from the Republicans, who are more interested in preserving the procedures of the Republic than acting toward what will be good results for all of us.

This party will have a simple philosophy:

* Natural rights instead of human rights or civil rights
* No wealth transfer from one group to another
* An end to all immigration and globalist control
* No debt spending, reject Keynesianism for Austrian economics
* Exile of anyone who participated in the election theft or groups responsible

That translates into an immediate plan for our survival: abolish the three-quarters of government that goes to entitlements, shut our borders, and withdraw from international finance while treating multi-national corporations and dual-citizenship people as foreigners who do not have our best interests at heart.

Our plan should be to recapture local communities and put this in action immediately, raising Constitutional challenges to federal power, while calling for a Convention of States to enshrine our values in law.
post.body_html:
Under the aegis of conserving our liberties, so that we can live voluntarily conservative lives against the grain in an increasingly liberal society, the GOP traded away America in order to get along with its colleagues, directly and indirectly transferring control of our society to China.

Since the 1960s, the GOP have become essentially a party of pro-defense "Christian libertarians" following the example of William F. Buckley, who wanted to preserve liberty so that we could live conservative lives despite civilization heading pell-mell into the abyss of tyranny and collapse that Leftism always brings.

We can no longer do this. We need a conservative alternative, and we should call it The Conservative Party to acknowledge its roots and differentiate it from the Republicans, who are more interested in preserving the procedures of the Republic than acting toward what will be good results for all of us.

This party will have a simple philosophy:

  • Natural rights instead of human rights or civil rights
  • No wealth transfer from one group to another
  • An end to all immigration and globalist control
  • No debt spending, reject Keynesianism for Austrian economics
  • Exile of anyone who participated in the election theft or groups responsible

That translates into an immediate plan for our survival: abolish the three-quarters of government that goes to entitlements, shut our borders, and withdraw from international finance while treating multi-national corporations and dual-citizenship people as foreigners who do not have our best interests at heart.

Our plan should be to recapture local communities and put this in action immediately, raising Constitutional challenges to federal power, while calling for a Convention of States to enshrine our values in law.

body:
> How does this make the most sense biologically?

I explained that, men are physical and women are mental. It makes perfect sense for people to serve different roles and specialties. Not everyone can do one thing or there will be no one to do the others. Nor can they be both, as one will get in the way of the other and it's not as efficient. Therefore people are specialized and engineered for particular roles.

> Largely biologically driven - the way you have phrased it makes it seem like vanity or triviality, which it is not.

This is also true, however I'm only discussing the raw difference in potential, not the actual result. Also behavioral impulses can have exceptions and are also possible to change, while fundamental differences in brain structure from the ground up are not. We also aren't sure how much of this biological vs socially driven. But regardless women can drastically improve their intelligence by changing this behavior, whereas men are usually stuck with whatever they've already got. Brain scans have shown that male brains are less symmetrical and many areas seem to be disabled, meaning they quite literally use less of their brain. It's also worth noting that prior to puberty when the sex differences are mostly insignificant, this difference is not apparent, even more evidence that sex has a lot to do with it. Boys start out with the same level of intelligence and creativity but lose it during puberty while developing more physically-oriented abilities, but this effect doesn't usually happen to the girls. I can even testify that I was in fact much more brilliant prior to puberty than I probably will ever be again, of the same kind that genius women like sfrohne are, and I am far from alone in suddenly losing this ability for this reason.

> And are they're mostly left-wing? Mostly but not all.

Because most of them act like they're from another planet. The exceptions who act normal are rarely leftist.

body: In my experience women are simply more intelligent than men, in terms of *inherent* potential (not actual results), and brain scans and other studies have backed that up, along with the fact that it makes the most sense from a biological viewpoint. A lot of things are a trade-off, men give up their intelligence and creativity for better physical abilities, and women sacrifice their strength for a more sophisticated mind. The reason women still trend around average is because they're usually too worried about hair and makeup and being popular to nurture it. The reason there's less of them on the lower extreme is because their overall spectrum is shifted higher. The reason there's less on the upper extreme is because few of them have interest in it, so it doesn't develop to full potential. However when you limit your sample to the minority of women who act like they're actually from the same planet, they are usually impressively smart. Take male geniuses (like me) and female ones (like sfrohne) and the latter is usually a savant compared to former, even though there are a lot less of them. That is a somewhat biased case as simple genetics are also a major factor (I do not have the best lineage for intelligence), but in my experience the general trend is still the same, just in a less extreme form. If you want a quick example, notice how ruqqus is mostly a male userbase by a longshot yet a lot of the top users, perhaps even most, are girls (interestingly there's a disproportionate amount of europeans to americans there too, despite the majority american demographic).

body:
Intelligence and especially "talent" in the creative fields is typically a feminine trait though. Women are usually the artists, the musicians, the feelers, the creators, the deep thinkers, the sophisticated, etc. Men are the athletes, the laborers and the soldiers. Aside from a few specific areas like coordination and strategic planning, too much intelligence would distract from those functions. Men can't be thinking too much, they just need to get the job done. During leisure time they can't waste energy on other pursuits, they need to be resting as much as possible for their next task (this explains why Homer Simpson's behavior is so typical). Women need higher intelligence and creativity for the non-physical functions, and also to survive with their physical disadvantage. It may also relate to raising children. Therefore their brains have a lot more intelligent potential, especially in the "right brain" which men basically don't have at all. They tend to be better learners, more intuitive, better at thinking outside the box, and can even see better. That makes perfect sense biologically, and brain scans back it up too. Unfortunately as I said most of them are way too feminine and girly and don't nurture this potential so it doesn't show, but the exceptions nearly always excel to a large degree (like sfrohne). I heard of some strategy game that is a good example of this, there's a lot more men who play it but the best player is a girl who beat professionals at a young age (I was thinking it's chess for some reason but I don't think that's it). Even on ruqqus you'll see that it's a mostly male userbase but many if not most of the top users are female.

Sorry for the long comment but it's difficult to explain in only a few words. It'd be nice if both could do both types of tasks and it'd be complete meritocracy, but unfortunately the tree of knowledge dictates that one type of function gets in the other's way and so people must be limited to one or the other, and male/female is the perfect way to go about determining which since it's universally a 50/50 chance.

guild.description: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.description_html: Got a burning unpopular opinion you want to share? Spark some discussions!
guild.name: UnpopularOpinion

post.body:
x-posted from +Conservative

---

I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

body: Read up on it. The Hebrews made a new writing system based on hieroglyphics and brought it to Canaan. This was later simplified into the Phoenician script, upon which the Greek alphabet is based, and upon that the Latin/Italic. Archaic greek inscriptions use some hebrew letters. Some even remain identical to this day, such as Œì.

post.body:
x-posted from +Conservative

---

I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). I've even seen a few complaining about how there's too much diversity and that's our problem (it used to be *forced* diversity that was complained about, because it's annoying PC crap). Even the sidebar of this guild says "no egalitarianism", which used to be one of the constitutional pillars for conservatives, "all men are created equal" (to clarify: in the sense of equality, not equity). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?

body:
> That is legal according to Jewish religious law

Prostitution is not legal, and polygamy was forbidden for kings.

> That does not in any way contradict my assertion, which is shared by most ancient middle eastern scholars, that the old testament in its current form was compiled and edited from preexisting myths and legends to form a narrative that was politically expedient for the people writing it at the time.

Yes it does, as you said the pentacheuch wasn't written until after the Babylonian captivity, and that right there is a fragment of the book of Numbers in Jerusalem from the first temple period. It's an amulet, so of course it's only going to include part of it. Also, there is an inscription in Egypt which may refer to Moses. A list of 10 virtues was also found in egypt that is very much like the ten commandments, which at the very least shows that the two groups influenced each other. And the alphabet used by the Canaanites and Israelites is clearly based on egyptian hieroglyphics. There is quite a lot of evidence that the Hebrews came to Canaan from Egypt.

"He also had multiple wives and owned prostitute slaves"

That is legal according to Jewish religious law

"Just so you know, a fragment of Numbers was discovered on an amulet found in Jerusalem, in the alphabet they used prior to Babylonian captivity"

That does not in any way contradict my assertion, which is shared by most ancient middle eastern scholars, that the old testament in its current form was compiled and edited from preexisting myths and legends to form a narrative that was politically expedient for the people writing it at the time. 

"Dr. Wayne Pitard has stated that although evidence for the antiquity of the Priestly Blessing is now compelling, this does not necessarily mean that the Book of Numbers already existed at that time.[8] Dr. James R. Davila has similarly pointed out that the idea that while the scrolls show that "some of the material found in the Five Books of Moses existed in the First Temple period", the suggestion that they are "proof that the Five Books of Moses were in existence during the First Temple period" (as described in an article in the Israeli newspaper Haaretz) is "an overinterpretation of the evidence.""

https://paleojudaica.blogspot.com/2004_09_26_archive.html#109644758320238769

https://www.nytimes.com/2004/09/28/science/solving-a-riddle-written-in-silver.html

parent.body:
Yes stories of Saul and David predate the Babylonian captivity but they were not written down in their current form until after the Babylonian captivity.

There probably was an Etruscan King of Rome named Tarquin who was overthrown by republicans but anything from that era of Roman history is taken with a grain of salt by modern historians because we don't have much in the way of contemporary primary sources from that place and time. The same is true of King David and Saul.

Much of the old testament is collections of folktales and mythical heroes. You'll note there are multiple different stories in the Bible about how David and Saul met, about how the Jews captured Jerusalem, and even about who killed Goliath.

You'll also note that the stories of David and Saul are actually older than the story of Exodus despite supposedly occurring chronologically after Exodus supposedly happens. One of the reasons we know this is because their are references to David keeping idols (which no post Moses Jew would do). The Exodus tale seems to be manufactured from whole cloth then inserted into the historical narrative to, once again, justify the spiritual authority of a priest caste returning from foreign captivity. This is also the time in history where Judaism picks up a lot of Zoroastrian influence. 

On the subject of Saul and his unworthiness to be king, Saul's first fall out with God comes because Saul does not commit ethnic cleansing thoroughly enough.

"Now go and smite Amalek, and utterly destroy all that they have, and spare them not; but slay both man and woman, infant and suckling, ox and sheep, camel and ass." Samuel-1 15:3

You gotta love how Yahweh specifically reminds the Israelites to not forget to kill the babies too.
